articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Synthetic Grass to Sports Teams and Football Teams
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Synthetic Grass to Sports Teams and Football Teams
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent synthetic grass for football training grounds to various sports teams and football teams including Amnokgang Sports Team, Kigwancha Sports Team, Pyongyang Sports Team and Sonbong Football Team.
					 Seeing the fashionable training grounds which seem to be covered with blue carpets, officials, players and coaches admired the warm loving care of Kim Jong Un who is sparing nothing for the development of the country's sports.
					
					 They vowed to make positive contributions to the development of the country's football by raising a strong wind for training.

articles.title: Gold Prize Awarded to Kimilsungia
articles.content:
Gold Prize Awarded to Kimilsungia
Beijing, May 6 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungia, the flower of the sun, was awarded the Gold Prize at the World Horticultural Expo held in Qingdao, Shandong Province, China.
					 The expo was opened on April 25. It brought together many units from 37 countries including the DPRK and various parts of China.
					
					 The DPRK wing is drawing an endless stream of visitors fascinated by wonderful Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias in full bloom.
					
					 An awarding ceremony was held on May 6 with figures of the expo organizing committee and delegates of various countries attending.
					
					 The Gold Prize and certificate were handed over to the head of the delegation of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee.
					
					 The executive head of the organizing committee for international horticultural contest of the expo said:
					
					 Kimilsungia is, indeed, a beautiful flower.
					
					 The flower was awarded the Gold Prize this time in the wake of its receipt of top prizes at the 2011 World Horticultural Expo in Xi'an, China and other expos. It proves once again that Kimilsungia is a famous flower recognized by the world.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK State Stamp Bureau issued a stamp in commemoration of the 2014 Qingdao International Horticultural Exposition, which has been held in China from April 25 to October 25.
					 The stamp pictures China roses in full bloom, with an emblem of the exposition on its upper part.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Bureau brought out a sheetlet featuring the galaxy.
					
					 The sheetlet shows the constellations of the northern and southern hemispheres as well as Bootes, Ursa Major, Virgo and Cygnus.

articles.title: Solar Energy in Effective Use in DPRK
articles.content:
Solar Energy in Effective Use in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has paid big efforts to using solar energy in an effective way.
					 The Natural Energy Institute under the State Academy of Sciences has recently developed solar heat technologies applicable to greenhouse, water heater and so on.
					
					 In particular, light solar collectors have been introduced into families of the lowland to solve the shortage of firewood for cooking meals.
					
					 The newly developed collector is lighter in weight and lower in production coast than existing ones.
					
					 It was highly appreciated at the National Exhibition of Achievements of Young Scientists and Technicians.
					
					 Hongwon County in South Hamgyong Province has produced solar cooker with locally available raw materials. The Ponghwa Co-op Farm of the county has introduced more than 100 cookers to be well received by housewives.
					
					 Besides, different kinds of apparatuses based on solar energy have been developed by several units, including the North Hwanghae Provincial People's Hospital.

articles.title: DPRK's Way of Activity
articles.content:
DPRK's Way of Activity
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- "Let us produce, study and live like the anti-Japanese guerrillas!" -- this is a slogan seen everywhere in the DPRK.
					 In March Juche 63 (1974) leader Kim Jong Il set forth the slogan after he proclaimed the program for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 Under the guidance of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the anti-Japanese guerrilla way of work and life turned into the DPRK way of activity in the era of Juche.
					
					 The anti-Japanese guerrilla method of work has served as a traditional method of work for the Workers' Party of Korea. Kim Jong Il stressed that it is a Juche-based method of work for carrying on the revolution and construction in reliance on the popular masses.
					
					 Meanwhile, a movement for winning the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment was launched in the Korean People's Army to follow the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the spirit displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, under the slogan "Let us train, study and live like the anti-Japanese guerrillas!"
					
					 The anti-Japanese guerrilla way of work and life was embodied in all realms of society, including politics, economy and culture, and the whole country turned into a grand sanctuary for education in the revolutionary traditions.
					
					 "Reminiscences of Anti-Japanese Guerrillas" serve as a precious textbook of struggle and life for all the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, convened the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea in February this year and advanced a revolutionary slogan calling on the party information workers to work like the buglers of the anti-Japanese guerrilla army.
					
					 All the DPRK people are now advancing vigorously along the road of independence, Songun (military-first policy) and socialism, holding higher the slogan "Let us produce, study and live like the anti-Japanese guerrillas!"

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Assails Criminal Nexus among S. Korea, U.S., Japan
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Assails Criminal Nexus among S. Korea, U.S., Japan
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean puppet forces move to intensify military nexus with Japan while working hard to conclude a south Korea-Japan agreement for the protection of military information under the manipulation of the U.S. They are doing so under the pretext of the nuclear and missile "threats" from the DPRK.
					 During Obama's junket to south Korea Park Geun Hye had a confab with him at which they agreed on the importance of information sharing among the U.S., Japan and south Korea. There was also a discussion on the exchanges of military information at recent high-level military talks among the three parties in Washington.
					
					 On April 28 a south Korean "government" official expressed the formal stand that "there can be a technical discussion with countries concerned for the conclusion of an agreement on sharing military information among south Korea, U.S. and Japan after the similar discussion within 'government'".
					
					 The conclusion of the agreement on the protection of military information with Japan had been pushed forward during the Lee Myung Bak regime but was failed in July, 2012 in the face of strong rebuff from the south Korean public.
					
					 Far from drawing a lesson from it, Park Geun Hye seeks to realize the exchanges of military information between south Korea and Japan by such a crafty way as signing a memorandum of understanding for the exchanges of military information among the U.S., Japan and south Korea without getting an approval from the "National Assembly" and going through the procedures of opening it to public by taking advantage of the chaotic political and economic situation in south Korea.
					
					 The conclusion of the agreement on the protection of military information with Japan is an act of treachery as it accelerates Japan's militarization and paves the way for its reinvasion of Korea.
					
					 It is also a crime against the DPRK and an extremely dangerous move for a war as it is aimed to push ahead with the creation of military alliance among the three parties and render tenser the situation on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Asia.
					
					 By taking advantage of the exchanges of military information among the three parties, the U.S. seeks to knock into shape the triangular military alliance and dominate the whole of Korea and the rest of Northeast Asia. In the meantime, Japan seeks to realize its ambition to become a military giant and to launch reinvasion. Traitor Park Geun Hye is mulling doing harm to her fellow countrymen in the north with the help of outsiders.
					
					 The sharing of information among the U.S., Japan and south Korea and completion of the triangular military alliance are a military adventure that brings the dark clouds of a fresh Cold War era, new world war to hang over Northeast Asia including the Korean peninsula as it is tantamount to the creation of "NATO" of Asian version, pursuant to the U.S. Asia strategy.
					
					 Outwardly, the evil woman pretends to cause a friction with Japan over the issues of Tok Islets and interpretation of history but behind the scene she stoops to any infamy to do harm to her fellow countrymen by trying to conclude a country-selling agreement, a war agreement under the manipulation of the U.S.
					
					 It is impossible to achieve neither detente on the Korean peninsula nor the security and peace of the nation as long as the Park Geun Hye group is allowed to stay in office as she is obsessed with dependence on outsiders and confrontation with her fellow countrymen.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should clearly understand the serious consequences to be entailed by the military tie-up among the U.S., Japan and south Korea and rise up in a courageous struggle to resolutely reject and foil it.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Military Nexus against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Military Nexus against DPRK
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Recently, south Korean ministry of Defense announced through its reference data concerning the "summit talks" held between Park Geun Hye and Obama that it would examine the issue of concluding a MOU on the "sharing of information" with the U.S. and Japan.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Wednesday observes in this regard:
					
					 The MOU the south Korean puppet forces are going to conclude with the U.S. and Japan is nothing but the one for the conclusion of an "agreement for protecting military information." Lurking behind this move is the sinister design of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors to establish the cooperation system against the DPRK and accelerate its preparations for a war against the north by forming its tripartite military alliance with the U.S. and Japan at any cost.
					
					 Park made much fuss in public over the issue of the past history to create impression that south Korea is in conflict with Japan. However, she is slyly moving to conclude at any cost the "agreement for protecting military information" with Japan once abandoned by traitor Lee Myung Bak. In a nutshell, Park is clinging to such a cynical ploy as the conclusion of the MOU which requires neither an approval by the "National Assembly" nor procedures of opening it to public.
					
					 Needless to say, it is just the U.S. which is encouraging the Park group to the military nexus with Japan.
					
					 The U.S. schemes to use the Japanese reactionaries and the south Korean puppet forces as shock brigades for its war against the DPRK.
					
					 As south Korea has not yet concluded an agreement of military alliance with Japan, the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance has not yet been knocked into shape.
					
					 So, the U.S. has instigated south Korea to conclude the "agreement for protecting military information" with Japan before forming an alliance with it.
					
					 Once south Korea concludes the agreement with Japan, the former can easily make military alliance with the latter, which would lead to the creation of the tripartite military alliance.
					
					 The DPRK will not overlook the military nexus being intensified among the U.S., Japan and south Korea as it would entail serious consequences.
					
					 The DPRK will take strong counter-measures in succession for self-defence, invariably holding aloft the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Editorially Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Editorially Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il proclaimed the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism as the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and published the famous work "Our Party's Media Is a Powerful Ideological Weapon Which Contributes to Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism" on May 7 40 years ago, clarifying mission, fundamental principle and basic duty of the media based on Kimilsungism. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial says that the WPK's media has radically changed its appearance and successfully performed its mission and duty at every stage of the revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is the great honor of our party's media that the revolutionary character of the Juche-oriented media has been firmly preserved and glorified for the last several decades under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and it is the highest pride of our party's media that it has dynamically accelerated the development of the era and the revolution and the building of a rich and powerful country through the intensified ideological campaign, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 Our party's media is the Juche-type one founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Il kindled the torch of bringing about a radical turn in writing editorials of Rodong Sinmun, the party's paper, in the 1970s and energetically led the work to make sure that a revolution was made in the overall activities of the media.
					
					 Thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il, our media could take on appearance as the Juche-type media remaining true to the cause of the President with loyalty with a writing brush and microphone for defending the leader against the backdrop of the historic advance for modeling the whole party and society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 All the journalists and other media persons emerged admirable eternal companions of the party under the loving care of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 All the party's media should become standard bearers and buglers who imbue all members of the society with Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the journalists and other media persons in the DPRK to put strong spurs to the work for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and bring earlier the final victory of the Juche revolution under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Should Not Play Trick in North-South Relations: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Should Not Play Trick in North-South Relations: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities suddenly raised the "three-point proposal to the north" while crying out for "unification initiative" and "expectation for positive response". They even talked rubbish that the implementation of the "Dresden declaration" would help ease tensions on the Korean peninsula and achieve marked progress in the north-south relations.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article says this is nothing but rigmarole to evade the responsibility for the present catastrophic north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' malignant vituperation against the DPRK has become a starting point that has driven the north-south relations into a catastrophe, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet authorities' vicious mud-slinging at the DPRK in wanton violation of the north-south agreement completely tarnished the atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces have become frantic in their hostile military moves in collusion with aggressive outsiders. This stoked to the extremes a nuclear war crisis on the peninsula, far from helping improve the north-south ties.
					
					 The current catastrophic north-south relations were not resulted overnight. This is an inevitable product of the persistent confrontational moves of the puppet forces who have not stood for the improvement of the north-south ties but have been keen to put into practice their design to make political and military provocations against the DPRK and isolate and stifle it at any cost in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the south Korean authorities deceive the public at home and abroad or cover up their nature as chief criminals bedeviling the relations between the north and the south and straining the situation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not run amuck, clearly understanding that their confrontational racket against the DPRK will bring them curse and denunciation of the whole Korean nation and worsening ruling crisis and a final ruin.

articles.title: Japan Can Never Shun Settlement of Hideous Past Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Can Never Shun Settlement of Hideous Past Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Japanese reactionaries thronged to Yasukuni Shrine to honor the memory of the war dead. The greatest number of Japanese politicians visited it since 1989.   They made no scruple of blustering that they honored the memory of war dead and the visit would go on in the future, too, as Japan hopes for world peace.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in an article in this regard:  This is nothing but nonsensical sophism that it is justifiable to tamper with history against the trend of the times.
					
					 Exposing the hideous unethical crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean people in the past, the article goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, far from honestly repenting of those crimes and apologizing for them, are praising those top class criminals as "patriots" and thronged to the shrine to honor their memory. It is absolutely intolerable.
					
					 The Korean people can never forget the monstrous crimes perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists after occupying Korea by force no matter how much water may flow under the bridge.
					
					 The moves of the Japanese reactionaries to keep their past crimes buried into the oblivion will only add to their crimes as they are going against the trend of the times.
					
					 It is a legal and moral obligation of Japan to liquidate its past crimes. The Japanese authorities had better know that they will become more hideous criminals than top class war criminals of Japanese imperialism if they calculate Japan may go without redressing its past crimes.
					
					 The Korean people will certainly force Japan to pay for its past crimes.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should express their will to liquidate the past crimes, to begin with, properly understanding the Korean people's enmity towards Japan.

articles.title: Papers Blast U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Papers Blast U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Obama during his recent junket to south Korea made not a few bellicose remarks. What is ill-boding among them is his pledge not to bother to use military force to defend alliance.
					 Papers Wednesday in commentaries describe this as a declaration of a war against the DPRK, the most undisguised and vivid expression of the hostile policy toward it that has been pursued by the U.S. for nearly seven decades.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that Obama disclosed his black-hearted intention through his visit to south Korea.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK that has lasted for nearly seven decades is the policy of strength, in essence.
					
					 The successive chief executives of the U.S. have persistently pursued the hostile policy toward the DPRK for decades but it is rare to find those who made so desperate efforts to invade the DPRK even though they suffer from economic downturn and slash in military spending.
					
					 The Obama administration has staged joint military exercises under various codenames, built up public opinion over the "issues" of the DPRK by abusing the UN for additional economic sanctions and enforced hostile policy toward the DPRK by mobilizing its allies. This is something unprecedented in history.
					
					 Clear is what countermeasure the DPRK will take now that it has become clear that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK remains unchanged and it began to put into practice its ambition to bring down the social system in the DPRK by force.
					
					 Minju Joson says as proven by history the DPRK will take stronger counteraction to cope with the U.S. ever-more undisguised moves to stifle it and this will make the U.S. situation all the more awkward.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Censured for Imploring Obama to Re-extend Transfer of Wartime Operation Control
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Censured for Imploring Obama to Re-extend Transfer of Wartime Operation Control
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- As already reported, Park Geun Hye implored U.S. President Obama during his recent visit to south Korea to re-extend the transfer of wartime operation control that had a 2015 deadline.
					 The south Korean puppet forces do not want to take over the prerogative over the army, not feeling ashamed of allowing outsiders to have the command of their armed forces, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					
					 The puppet forces glaringly disclosed their despicable nature as war servants of the U.S. seeking to do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north by force of arms with the backing of outsiders, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The agreement on the re-extension of the transfer will entail a very serious consequence.
					
					 In return for the re-extension, the puppet forces agreed to offer more funds for the upkeep of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea, purchase lots of lethal weapons including latest fighters from the U.S. and actively take part in its missile defense system. This proves that the military nexus between the U.S. and the south Korean authorities and their moves to provoke a war against the DPRK have entered more dangerous phase. It is as clear as a pikestaff that the U.S. and the puppet forces' moves will escalate tensions on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia to the extremes and increase arms race.
					
					 The re-extension farce is a product of dangerous collusion between the master and its stooge to provoke a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula at any cost.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is a despicable sycophantic traitor putting the five traitors of 1905 into the shade as she implored outsiders to have full command of south Korean army, risking huge costs, even though it had been left to the mercy of outsiders for decades.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams Puppet Ruling Forces' Propaganda about "North Wind"
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams Puppet Ruling Forces' Propaganda about "North Wind"
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea issued a statement on May 2 denouncing the puppet group for its racket for escalating the confrontation.
					 The statement said:
					
					 As soon as Park Geun Hye agreed to stop the smear campaign between the south and the north, she pushed the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe while letting loose a spate of vituperation against the north.
					
					 At the talks with Obama, too, she made reckless remarks against the north such as "additional sanctions".
					
					 Thrown into a tight corner by the Sewol ferry sinking, she seeks to find a way out of the crisis through the trite propaganda about "the north wind".
					
					 The ruling party raised again the "bill on north Korean human rights issue". This is nothing but a third-rate drama to get on the nerves of the north and weather the ruling crisis through the above-said propaganda.
					
					 Through the confrontation racket and saber-rattling the regime will meet nothing but a self-destruction.
					
					 Park should come to her senses, though belatedly, and halt at once the charade for security and propaganda about the "north wind".
					
					 Otherwise, she will face unimaginably strong rebuff of the people.

articles.title: U.S. Plagued with Serious Gun-related Crimes
articles.content:
U.S. Plagued with Serious Gun-related Crimes
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Serious gun-related crimes occurred in Texas and Kansas, etc. of the U.S., claiming the lives of dozens of people.
					 At a U.S. military base in Texas State a soldier in his combat fatigue desperately made shooting spree, leaving three persons dead and 16 others wounded. It caused such great chaos that many around the scene of the crime ran about to seek shelters. A similar crime took place in November, 2009, too in this military base, leaving 13 dead and 32 others wounded.
					
					 As regards the gun-related crime which occurred in Kansas on April 14, Obama shouted hoarse that such case should not be allowed to occur again as it makes people worry about their safety. But gun-related crimes are like a malignant tumor hard to cure as they are rampant in the society as a trend.
					
					 Due to ceaseless gun-related crimes, people are exposed to constant threat to their safety. They are not free from uneasiness and horror. 
					
					 In the U.S. 69.3 percent of murders and 41 percent of robberies are gun-related crimes.
					
					 The number of guns possessed by individual inhabitants reaches about O.3 billion and over 100 000 people are suffering from gun-related crimes.
					
					 In New York in 2013 alone, there occurred 1 093 gun-related crimes.
					
					 The U.S. is plagued with all social evils and awash with guns. So, gun-related crimes take place frequently regardless of time, place and age.
					
					 Shooting sprees occur at campuses of universities and high schools, department stores and even churches. Due to these crimes, those who are not particularly related to criminals fall victim to them with their grudge unsettled and many people meet grievous deaths.
					
					 Even soldiers and policemen who should be responsible for the lives and security of people are involved in these gun-related crimes. For instance, a policeman shot a man living in a tent to death in March last.
					
					 As society is awash with guns, even children brandish guns, causing a series of gun-related crimes.
					
					 A 2 year-old boy fired a loaded gun at his 11-year old sister on her breast by accident in the bedroom of his parents at a house in Philadelphia City on April 6. A little boy in a city of Georgia State also accidentally shot her 10-year old sister to death on April 4.
					
					 As seen above, the U.S. tops the world list of gun-related crimes.
					
					 It is quite natural that social uneasiness is growing day by day among Americans due to various crimes including gun-related crimes.

articles.title: Chinese Internet Paper Terms S. Korean Regime Corrupt One
articles.content:
Chinese Internet Paper Terms S. Korean Regime Corrupt One
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- An article disclosing the corrupt nature of the south Korean puppet regime titled "Felonies disappear in the wake of the sinking of the ferry Sewol" was posted on a Chinese internet paper on May 2.
					 Recalling that many south Korean people threw away the wreaths sent by Park Geun Hye and Lee Myung Bak as an expression of their indignation against Park's visit to the Ansan public incense-burning altar, the article said: This showed such pitiful plight of the former and incumbent rulers of south Korea that even their wreaths were rejected by the mourners.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 Despite the disaster of the ferry sinking, the south Korean regime is busy desperately kicking off a racket to "eliminate the followers of the north". Such a reality makes people keenly realize what corrupt, incompetent and rotten society the era of sycophancy and ruined nation has brought. It also helps to know what awful tragedy and misfortune the era of division due to foreign domination has inflicted upon the Koreans.
					
					 A ferry called "Lee-Park" built in the worst era of sycophancy and national ruin is rapidly sinking.
					
					 It is now being buried at the bottom of the sea in the wake of the disaster of the ferry Sewol sinking recorded in history.
					
					 The ferry sinking disaster set the stage for craftily hiding power-backed crimes and shielding their masterminds.
					
					 The Intelligence Service, prosecution and police, once put on a chopping board due to their illegal interference in the 2012 "presidential" election, are going scot-free after occurrence of a series of alarming cases like the tail of a lizard being cut off to remain alive.
					
					 They are resorting to all sorts of illegal acts to keep the Park era afloat and help her stay in office.
					
					 The sky of south Korea is overcast with dark clouds.

articles.title: Romanian Political Figure Condemns Obama's Tour of S. Korea
articles.content:
Romanian Political Figure Condemns Obama's Tour of S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, on April 29 posted on the website "Juche Idea" an article "Dangerous movement aimed at U.S. permanent presence in south Korea."
					 The author denounced Obama for disclosing once again the U.S. strategy for the permanent U.S. forces' presence in south Korea during his recent Asian junket.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 What is more serious is that the south Korean authorities are zealously toeing the U.S. strategy towards the DPRK, pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to a crisis. 
					
					 The Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania bitterly condemns the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' moves for tightening their military nexus.
					
					 We fully support the statements of spokesmen for the National Defence Commission and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK once again urging the U.S. to cogitate about its behavior.
					
					 We are convinced that the heroic Korean people will register greater successes in the struggle for preserving the dignity of the nation and the security of the country, achieving the reunification of the country and building an economic power, rallied closer behind their leader to foil the desperate moves of the imperialists.
					
					 Only victory is in store for the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people led by First Secretary Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Observed in Guinea
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Observed in Guinea
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- A lecture took place in Guinea on April 29 to mark the 78th anniversary of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland.
					 Present there were teachers and students of Guinean Art College.
					
					 The dean of the Faculty of Fine Art of the college said in a lecture titled "The first revolutionary national united front in Korea-the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland" that the Korean people were waging a dynamic struggle for achieving the independent peaceful reunification of the country through the great unity of the whole nation in the idea of By the Korean Nation Itself.
					
					 The dean went on:
					
					 The Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland was founded on May 5, 1936.
					
					 The association was the first anti-Japanese national united front which was founded and led by President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 It grew to be a pan-national organization in a short period since its founding and made a great contribution to overthrowing the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and achieving the liberation of Korea.
					
					 Thanks to such tradition of the great national unity the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Social Organizations in North and South Korea was held after the liberation of the country and the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification formed in the 1990s.
					
					 And the year 2000 witnessed the north-south summit, the first of its kind in the history of division and it culminated in the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration which called for independently solving the issue of the reunification of the country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 Korea's reunification is sure to be achieved as there is a powerful weapon for achieving the great national unity on the basis of the rich experience gained in the movement of the national united front and the will of all Koreans to thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration, the milestone of reunification.

articles.title: ACNC comenta acto antinacional y anti-RPDC de corruptores inmorales
articles.content:
ACNC comenta acto antinacional y anti-RPDC de corruptores inmorales
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, la banda titere del Sur de Corea se apresura a fortalecer el contubernio militar con Japon acelerando la concertacion del convenio de proteccion de informaciones militares con este pais insular bajo el control de Estados Unidos so pretexto de la "amenaza" de las armas nucleares y misiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En las conversaciones con Obama durante su reciente visita al Sur de Corea, Park Geun-hye, se dio enfasis en la importancia de la copropiedad de informaciones de EE.UU.-Japon- el Sur de Corea.
					
					Ademas en las conversaciones de alto nivel de las capas militares de dichos 3 paises recien efectuadas en Washington, tambien se debatio el problema sobre el intercambio de informaciones militares.
					
					El 28 de abril, un relacionado con el "gobierno" publico oficialmente la posicion de que la concertacion del acuerdo sobre la compartimiento de informaciones militares entre el Sur de Corea, Japon y EE.UU. sometera a la discusion de trabajo con el pais relacionado tras realizar el debate de trabajo en el "gobierno".
					
					La firma del convenio arriba mencionado se impulso en gran escala en el periodo del poder del traidor Lee Myung Bak, pero no se logro por la resistencia fuerte de la opinion publica del Sur de Crea en el dia de la concertacion en julio de 2012.
					
					Lejos de sacar las lecciones de alli, Park intenta realizar el intercambio de informaciones militares con Japon a manera astuta de concluir la nota de entendimiento sobre el intercambio de informaciones militares de EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea sin pedir autorizacion de la "Asamblea Nacional" y los tramites oficiales aprovechando la oportunidad de que el pais se hundio en confusion politica y economica.
					
					La firma del convenio de proteccion de informaciones militares con Japon es el crimen antinacional que impulsa la militarizacion del pais isleno y le abre el camino de reagresion.
					
					Tambien deviene el crimen anti-RPDC y el mas peligroso acto provocativo de guerra que agrava la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region de Asia acelerando el establecimiento de la alianza militar de EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Aprovechando la oportunidad de la realizacion del intercambio de informaciones militares entre 3 paises, EE.UU. intenta dominar toda Corea y la region del Nordeste Asiatico estableciendo la alianza militar tripartita. A su vez, Japon pretende lograr la conversion de su pais en la potencia militar y su ambicion de reagresion.
					
					La traidora Park Geun-hye intenta perjudicar a la connacional RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					El compartimiento de informaciones entre EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea y la formacion de la alianza militar tripartita es la fundacion de la OTAN de version asiatica segun la estrategia de EE.UU. sobre Asia y aventura militar que acarrea el nubarron de nueva epoca de guerra  fria, nueva guerra mundial a la region del Noreste Asiatico incluyendo la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Park Geun-hye, por apariencia, finge estar en conflicto con Japon en cuanto al problema del islote Tok y el entendimiento de historia, etc., pero detras de la cortina  pretende concluir el convenio de traicion al pais, el de guerra con Japon bajo el manejo de EE.UU. Verdaderamente ella es vendepatria servil a grandes potencia y mujer malvada que comete sin alguna vacilacion crimenes para perjudicar  a los connacionales.
					
					Mientras no se extirpe la banda de Park enloquecida por la dependencia de las fuerzas foraneas y la confrontacion fratricida, no se realizara la relajacion de tension de la Peninsula Coreana ni se lograran la seguridad de la nacion y la paz.
					
					Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben ver correctamente las consecuencias graves que se emanen del contubernio militar de EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea y levantarse audazmente en la lucha por frenar y destruirlo rotundamente.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza "3 propuestas sobre el Norte" de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza "3 propuestas sobre el Norte" de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- Al presentar las "3 propuestas sobre el Norte (de Corea)", las autoridades titeres surcoreanas las califican de "proyecto de reunificacion" diciendo que "esperan la respuesta activa de la RPDC".
					Ademas, chismean que si se implementa la "Declaracion de Dresden", se relajara la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y se lograra avance trascendental en las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual difundido este miercoles, senala que tales actos verbales no pasan de ser una artimana para eludir la responsabilidad del actual estado catastrofico de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas, y continua:
					
					La difamacion de las autoridades surcoreanas sobre la RPDC ha sido la causa de la ruptura de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Al cometer los actos militares hostiles en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, ellas agravaron al maximo en la Peninsula Coreana la crisis de guerra nuclear, lejos de mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					La situacion actual de las relaciones intercoreanas es producto inevitable de la campana conflictiva de la banda titere surcoreana que comete provocaciones politicas y militares a la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras y trata de aislarla y atropellarla a toda costa.
					
					Aunque fueran muy elocuentes, las autoridades surcoreanas no podran enganar la opinion publica interna y externa ni ocultar su naturaleza criminal de destructor de relaciones intercoreanas y autor del empeoramiento de la situacion.
					
					Ellas deben actuar con prudencia al darse cuenta de que su campana conflictiva anti-RPDC no dara otro resultado que la condena de toda la nacion, la agravacion de la crisis de gobernacion y la destruccion final.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica visita colectiva de politicos japoneses al santuario Yasukuni
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica visita colectiva de politicos japoneses al santuario Yasukuni
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los reaccionarios japoneses visitaron en colectivo al santuario Yasukuni. En esta visita participo el numero mas grande de politiqueros despues del ano 1989.
					Los visitantes dijeron sin escrupulos que recordaron a los caidos en la segunda guerra mundial y continuaran visitando ese lugar porque su pais desea la paz mundial.
					
					En un articulo individual divulgado el dia 7, el diario Rodong Sinmun apunta que tal sofisteria de los reaccionarios japoneses es para justificar sus actos antihistoricos, tales como la tergiversacion de la historia y el desafio a la corriente de la epoca.
					
					Tras recordar los crimenes antieticos cometidos en el pasado por el imperialismo japones contra la nacion coreana, el editorial continua:
					
					No se puede tolerar que los reaccionarios islenos elogiaran a los criminales de guerra como "patriotas", lejos de arrepentirse y pedir disculpas, y visitaran en colectivo al santuario Yasukuni donde se conservan las tablillas mortuorias de esos delincuentes.
					
					Aunque pase mucho tiempo, el pueblo coreano no puede olvidar los crimenes del imperialismo japones cometidos despues de ocupar con las fuerzas armadas a Corea.
					
					Las tentativas de los reaccionarios japoneses de dejar en el olvido de la historia los crimenes del pasado son un desafio a la corriente de la epoca actual.
					
					Para el pais isleno, la liquidacion del pasado es una obligacion legal y moral. Si las autoridades japoneses piensan que su pais podra vivir eludiendo esa obligacion, ellas seran peores delincuentes que los criminales de guerra de primera categoria.
					
					El pueblo coreano cobrara sin falta el precio de los crimenes del pasado de Japon.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben tomar la voluntad de liquidar el expediente criminal de su pais al ver bien la enemistad antijaponesa del pueblo coreano.
